original_text: “‘But you trusted in your beauty and used your fame to become a prostitute. You lavished your favors on anyone who passed by and your beauty became his.
korean_text: 그러나 네가 네 화려함을 믿고 네 명성을 가지고 행음하되 지나가는 모든 자와 더불어 음란을 많이 행하므로 네 몸이 그들의 것이 되도다

sentences.original_text: But you trusted in your beauty
and used your fame to become a prostitute
You lavished your favors on anyone who passed by
sentences.korean_translation: 네 은총을 지나가는 모든 자에게 베풀었으며
